about_the_game:
This game is not being worked on at the moment. It's on hold indefinitely

Drainscape is a vertical action adventure with roguelite elements, where you must survive your fall through a drain filled with obstacles and enemies with only an umbrella to save you.
As you progress, the drain becomes darker and more dangerous, will you be good enough to survive?

Your umbrella as your last chance
To avoid falling to your death, you must use your umbrella. Opening it up to slows you down. Closing it sends you diving at full speed, allowing you to break obstacles and defeat enemies.

Conquer the drain
Your goal is simple: reach the end of the drain without dying. But what is it filled with? What is at the end? Is there and end? What does all of this mean? You'll have to try and retry to finally see it.

Augment yourself
After all, you're just a cog in this big machine, a simple piece of metal, so why not augment yourself? Choose between many upgrades at the end of each level to assist you in your descend.
